string.text: Find "Stone Blood" artifact.
Find "Stone Blood" artifact.
Find "Stone Blood" artifact and fetch it to the Trader.
Find "Jellyfish" artifact.
Find "Jellyfish" artifact.
Find "Jellyfish" artifact and fetch it to the Trader.
Find "Twist" artifact.\n
Find "Twist" artifact.
Find "Twist" artifact and fetch it to the Trader.
Beat out bandits from the factory.
Eliminate bandits hidden at the factory.
Eliminate all the bandits at the factory.
Report to the Trader.
Talk to Wolf, so he could take his own people for the attack.
Steal the case from the army post.
Steal the case with important documenta from the commander of the army post.
Steal the case from the army post. It's better to be done without causing alarm.
Bring the case to the Trader.
Defend the novices camp from the mercenaries.
Defend the novices camp from the mercenaries.
Eliminate the detachment of the mercenaries.
Talk to the novices commander.
Bring dynamite to Wolf.
It's necessary to take the dynamite from the bandits at the factory and bring it to Wolf.
Meet Wolf's people.
Find the dynamite at the factory.
Bring dynamite to Wolf.
Help the wounded Fox.
Provide help to the wounded stalker.
Help Fox ward off mutants.
Receive an important information from him about the Gunslinger.
Deliver the parcel to the Trader.
Deliver the parcel to the Trader. He could help you.
Meet the stalker at the garbage.
Meet Grey on Garbage.
Meet Doctor
Meet Doctor
Meet Doctor at Gunslinger's cache
Kill the Gunslinger.
Find the Gunslinger.
Find the artifact.
Find your first artifact.
Find first artifact.
Bring the artifact to the Trader.
Take the information from the scount of the Trader.
Take the information from the scouts of the trader.
Meet stalkers and take flash-drive with the information from them.
Deliver the information to the Trader.
